entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
